channel.title: Marcus Aurelius Quote API with Mobius Token Integration
channel.description: Recent content on Marcus Aurelius Quote API with Mobius Token Integration

item.title: API Reference
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the Marcus Aurelius Quotes for Mobius API! You can use our API to receive a random Marcus Aurelius quote. This is an HTTP only API, so you can use either curl or a browser to access it. If you would like to create something like this, there is documentation here: https://medium.com/@billzajac/mobius-with-python-and-google-appenine-68e0cf7e4060 And example code here: https://github.com/billzajac/mobius-marcus-aurelius This API documentation page was created with DocuAPI, a multilingual documentation theme for the static site generator Hugo.
